full on off stump, going straight through, and defended of the front foot
full on off stump, defended off the front foot to cover. Sees the over out.

tossed up wide outside off, driven square with the bat's open face. Work in the deep, and intercepted inside the boundary. The final run could've been tight, but excellent running keeps the batsmen safe
back of a length outside off, and goes straight through. Takes some extra bounce as well and goes just outside his edge. Could've easily taken a feather touch
good length on middle stump, turned off his toes to midwicket
full on middle and leg, worked off his pads to deep midwicket. They rotate the strike with ease
full on leg stump, flicked off his pads to deep midwicket once again
back of a length outside off, tries to cut this fine but can't connect
back of a length outside off, stands tall and punches to cover. But the man's stationed there
full on middle and leg, tapped to midwicket for a quick run. It's a direct hit! But they're comfortably in
good length on middle stump, it's the slower ball this time. Goes down the leg side as the batsman misses his flick
full outside off and swings into the left hander. Tries to defend but the movement induces the inside edge. Ricochets onto his pads

full on off stump, the batsman walks across to the off side and drive straight, but he's played down the wrong line! Hits him full on off stump and Fizz's appeal for lbw is given. Another cutter, and that does the trick
good length on off stump, defended off the back foot
full on off stump, bunted down the ground with the turn. Only to wide mid on
full on middle stump, big stride forward and defended
first runs for Chandimal in this Test Tossed up outside off, and smacked down the ground to long off
full on leg stump, turning across the left hander, tapped towards square leg for a quick run
full on off stump, defended to cover with soft hands. They want the quick run, but Mehidy is quick to intercept
tossed up on off stump, comfortably driven past the non-striker to long off
good length on off stump, angles into Chandimal. Defended off the back foot
full on off stump, prods forward and taps it towards the off side
full outside off, it's the cutter once again. Played with the bat's open face but stopped by Mehidy at second slip. Stops the single, but hurts his elbow in the process
good length on off stump from around the wicket. Extra bounce and defended off the back foot
full on off stump, gets inside the line of the ball and offers the bat's full face. Blocked
full outside off, overpitched and smacked off the front foot. But can't beat mid off
full on middle and leg, comes forward and defends the first ball
full on off stump, no turn this time and it goes straight through with the angle. Flies past the outside edge and through to the keeper
full on middle and leg, clipped off his pads towards the leg side
full on leg stump, comes down the wicket and taps it to midwicket. No opportunity for the single
full on middle and leg, swept but comes off short leg's body. Drops short of leg slip. Chance!
tossed up on leg stump, worked off his toes to square leg. Another dot to end the over
back of a length outside off, opens the bat's face and turns it towards point
full on off stump, big stride forward and defended
good length on off stump, cut off the back foot to the man in the deep. Quick to get into position
short on leg stump, gets under the line of the ball and lets it go through. A well-directed bouncer
full on middle and leg, turned with the angle to deep backward square off his toes
full outside off, ends the over with the cutter again. Firmly defended off the front foot... and that's tea!
good length outside off, defended on the front foot
short and turning in at off stump. Chopped to deep backward point
full on leg stump, pinged on the front leg as he looks to defend
good length on leg stump, nudged through midwicket off the back foot
good length on off stump, punched to long-off from the crease
tossed up at off stump, steps out and blocks close to the body
good length and in at off stump, defended on the front foot
full outside off, driven straight to mid-off
good length outside off, defended on the front foot
short and wide, cut straight to deep point
length ball in at middle stump, flicks to fine leg
yorker on off stump and he closes the face to tuck this to deep square
good length and in at off stump, defended solidly on the front foot
good length on middle stump, pushed to midwicket on the front foot

taken at midwicket! Karunratne steps down the track and hits it straight to the fielder. Length ball dipping at leg stump forces him to try and get the bat ahead of the pad. He manages it but can't keep the shot down
full on middle stump, flicked to midwicket
full at off stump, clipped straight to square leg
good length and in at off stump. Stays tall in the crease and steers this through square leg
full outside off, tapped to mid-off off the toe end

full outside off, check-drive to mid-off and they try to steal a single. It's a direct hit but the umpire wasn't in position to judge that. So he has sent it upstairs. Silva's got a good stride in and dragged the bat in. He survives
good length outside off, defended on the front foot

outside edge drops in front of first slip. Length ball grips and spits up at the batsman as he looks to defend on the front foot. It falls to slip's right and his one-handed effort won't get them the wicket
good length and in at leg stump. Tapped wide of mid-on
big cutter. Length outside off, fizzes past the outside edge but misses by a long way as he looks to fend at it
full and down leg side, flicked to long leg and his throw has managed, somehow, to sneak through to long-off for a n overthrow
good length at leg stump, defended into the leg side
good length at leg stump, allows it to come on and tickles it fine. Slip and long leg give chase but they can't make it
full at off stump, defended on the front foot
full at off stump, defended to silly point
back of a length outside off, punched to extra cover off the back foot
beaten by another cutter. Length ball outside off, draws him in and takes it away with a puff of dust in trail
good length on middle stump, clipped to deep square leg
short of a length and moving away, wide outside off. Left alone
bak of a length at off stump, defended towards gully off the back foot
offuctter, back of a length on leg stump. Gets on top of the bounce and deflects it to deep square's right
good length on middle, tucked through square leg off the back foot
tossed up at middle stump, jammed back to the bowler
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
tossed up full at leg stump, pushed to square leg on the front foot
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
full at leg stump, defended on the front foot
full at off stump, dead-batted into the off side

what's happening here? Appeal for run out! Good length outside off, and extra bounce forces the batsman to hurry. Takes his gloves and falls to Mehidy at first slip. He's quick to throw at the striker's stumps, and it's a direct hit! Is the batsman out of the crease? Naw, he's good. Just got back before the stumps were broken. Close! Chandimal needs a physio to check his hand
good length outside off stump. Bowls this from around the wicket, and left alone
full on off stump, tries to clip it towards the leg side, but comes off his pads. Appeal for lbw from Fizz, but turned down
full on off stump, tapped off the front foot to midwicket. Quickly intercepted by the infielder
back of a length outside off, cutter that goes away from the right hander after pitching. Shoulders his arms
beauty! Good length on off stump, and straightens instead of angling into the right hander. Tries to defend down the wrong line as the ball goes just over off stump. Phew
back of a length outside off, mistimed cut back to the bowler
good length on middle stump, clipped through square leg from the crease
back of a length outside off, opens the face and guides it to backward point
full on off stump, defended on the front foot
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
turns big and climbs past the outside edge. Chandimal not fully forward as he looks to defend
good length just outside off, defended on the front foot
slower ball, full outside off. Pushed to point with an open face
yorker on middle stump. Gets the front leg out of the way and digs it out
full on off stump, defended on the front foot
poor line. Back of a length and on leg stump. Stands tall and glances it fine with minimal fuss
full outside off, defended with the turn into the covers
full outside off stump, defended on the front foot
full on middle stump, defended on the front foot
back of a length and in at off stump, punched to extra cover off the back foot
back of a length outside off, pushed to mid-off off the back foot
length on off stump, tapped to extra cover off the back foot
full on off stump, defended on the front foot
full at middle stump, steps out and taps back to the bowler
good length at off stump, defended from the crease
short of a length outside off, lunges onto the back foot to get on to of the bounce and punches this wide of cover to beat his dive
tossed up outside off, driven firmly through the covers but this time short extra leaps and stops to his left
good length and into the pads. Pings to short leg as he misses the flick
full outside off, defended on the front foot
back of a length outside off, pushed wide of extra cover off the back foot
short of a length wide outside off, cut to cover
good length and in at off stump. Under-edges the cut
good length on off stump, defended off the back foot
tossed up on off stump, steps out and pushes to mid-off's left. Razzak tumbles as he fields and they take his throw on to get the second
good length at off stump, draws the outside edge but that is played with soft hands and the edge won't carry to slip
good length on middle stump, keeping low. He watches it closely and pushes to short fine
floated up at off stump, steps out and taps to mid-off
tossed up outside off, driven back to the bowler who misfields to his left
good length on middle stump, defended on the front foot
good length at off stump, defended on the front foot with soft hands
length outside off, dead-batted into the pitch
back of a length at off stump, tapped to extra cover off the back foot
full on leg stump, allows it to come on and duly whips it through midwicket with the back leg raised
dropped short outside off, hangs deep in the crease and hammers this on the up between cover and extra
good length on middle stump, defended on the front foot
falls short of first slip. Good length outside off, pushes in front of the body and gets an edge that doesn't carry
length on middle stump, defended on the front foot
good length on middle stump, pushed into the leg side off the back foot
length outside off, steps out and drives to short extra
short of a length outside off, goes very deep in the crease and adjusts to open the face and arch backwards as this ball comes in with the arm. Slices it past backward point
good length outside off, left alone
this is poor from Razzak. Drops a loopy one short and wide outside off. Silva doesn't even bother to try and keep it down. Backs away and slaps it between the two cover fielders
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
tossed up first ball outside off, walks across to the off side and flicks to midwicket. But a diving stop from the fielder ensures it's a dot

hits him low, and given by the umpire! Good length outside off but turning sharply into the Sri Lanka captain. The ball stays really low and foxes Chadnimal as he tries to play across the line. Hits him under his knee in front of off stump. The breakthrough after the drinks interval. How often have we seen that?

is that two in two?! Dickwella reviews asap. Full on off stump and he misses the sweep. Replays show that a bottom edge takes the ball onto his boot. This will be overturned. 'Not out' flashes on the screen
good length outside off, angling into the left hander. Backs away and cuts to point for a quick run
good length on off stump, defended off the front foot towards the leg side
full on leg stump, and it's the reverse sweep! Smacked fine over the infield, and it's a chase for Razzak at third man. Manages to boot the ball back in
back of a length outside off, goes deep into the crease and mistimes to mid off
full on off stump, prods forward and defends
back of a length outside off, grips the surface and turns away as Roshen attempts a defense. The ball goes past him
good length outside off, stands tall and cuts to the man in the deep
good length outside off, turns into the left hander, defended
full on off stump, tries to paddle this towards the leg side but misses. Big appeal but turned down! Impact outside off, one reckons

good length outside off, spinning away from him as he tries to lift it over the infield. It's mistimed, and Razzak and Mushfiq - from mid off and mid on - get under it, but Razzak drops the catch. Pops out after hitting his hand. Goes down as a dropped chance
full on off stump, defended firmly off the front foot
once again tossed up on middle stump, mistimes his sweep to short fine leg
good length on off stump, turns it off his hips to short fine leg for a walking single
short and wide outside off, stands tall and cuts away from his body. Forced to reach at it, and mistimed to point

overpitched on middle and leg, comes down the ground and drives exquisitely back past the non-striker. The infielders need to give a chase, but an excellent stop from Mehidy ensures it's not a boundary
back of a length on middle stump, carved off the back foot to the man in the deep
full on off stump, prods forward and turns it towards the leg side
full on off stump, prods forward and flicks towards the leg side on this occasion
tossed up on off stump, Dickwella thinks to sweep but checks his shot. Defends
good length on off stump, flicked off his hips to the leg side. No run
full on off stump, spinning into Roshen. Works it towards the leg side
tossed up on off stump, and Roshen comes dancing down the wicket! Muscled with the turn over midiwcket, and there's no stopping that!
good length wide outside off, spinning into Silva. Stays on the back foot and runs it down to deep backward point
full on off stump, tapped off his toes to midwicket for a quick run
full on middle stump, down on one knee once again, and swept to short fine leg. Mistimed
good length outside off, spins into Roshen. Firmly blocked off the front foot
it's a full toss on middle stump but Dickwella is already ready to reverse sweep. Gets some connection off that, and well stopped by third man
full on off stump, angling into the right hander, and defended with soft hands
delightful delivery! On a good length, pitches on off stump, and grips & turns away away from the right hander. Sharp take from the keeper
full on off stump, big stride forward and defended
full on off stump, comes down the ground and blocks
on a good length, pitches on middle stump, flicked off his pads towards the leg side. Straight to square leg

soft dismissal, or is it? It's the substitute. The umpire wants to have a second look, though! Full on off stump and Dickwella attempts the reverse sweep. Comes off the top half of the bat, and lobs away towards the left-hander's off side. Hayder at point dives forward, and takes the catch. But replays show it may have dropped before. It's too close to call for me, to be honest. We wait for the umpire's decision. The third umpire says 'there's nothing conclusive to go against the not out (the umpire's call)'. Yep, nothing to determine that it's a clean catch.... not out.
full on middle stump, fended off the front foot
full on middle stump, quick to get down on one knee and slaps this sweep to the man in the deep
good length on middle stump, sharp turn across the batsman's body and down the leg side
fuller ball outside off stump, stays slightly low as it turns into the right hander, flicked to the leg side

full on off stump, and Roshen isn't afraid to come down the wicket. Meets the ball on the half-volley and lifts it over midwicket. Chase for wide long on, but he can't cut it off. Ends with a boundary

Plucked out of thin air! Full on off stump, and it's swept well off the front foot, but straight to Mahmudullah at square leg. Not an easy catch as the ball was travelling, but he stuck his hand out, and the ball stayed in his palms. Big wicket
full on middle stump, prods forward and defends
good length on middle stump, flicked off his pads via the back foot to deep midwicket
full on middle and leg, flicked off the front foot towards the non-striker
full on middle stump, driven down the ground to mid off
back of a length on off stump, stands tall and punches to wide mid off
full on off stump, big stride forward and blocked with authoriteh
back of a length on middle stump,  shuffles across to the off side and turned towards the leg side
full on off stump, comes forward and defends
back of a length on off stump, forced to go onto the back foot, and blocked back to the bowler
quicker ball, on a good length and pitches on middle. Defended towards the leg side
good length outside off, keeps his eyes on the ball and fends it away
full on off stump, and it's crunched! Extravagantly driven, and puts this half volley away. Excellent timing

what a comeback ball! Has that taken the outside edge? Dilruwan reviews after a short consultation. Good length outside off, and straightening after pitching. The batsman tried poking at it, and yes, it's taken a feather edge off the bat's bottom. Excellent catch from Liton, who was standing up to Fizz
first-ball duck! Mustafizur is on a hattrick! Good length outside off, and once again that corridor does the trick. Pokes at it tentatively, and easily taken by Liton. Two in two!
good length on middle stump, angling down the leg side as Lakmal misses the flick. Taken well by the keeper on the leg side but no contact off the bat. Lakmal survives

dropped by first slip! Good length on off stump, tries to defend off the back foot but takes a thick outside edge. Flies away to Sabbir at first slip, but hits his fingers and gets away. Sabbir's in some pain
back of a length outside off, extra bounce off the surface, defended
full just on off stump, prods forward and tentatively defends
tossed up on middle stump, driven past the bowler's left long off
full on off stump, big stride forward and tapped towards the leg side
full on off stump, tries to defend but the outside edge takes it to point. They're taking the single, but it's a direct hit! Safe, though. The throw hit Liton's boot and ricocheted onto the stumps
overpitched on leg stump, and going down the leg side. Left alone by Lakmal
full on off stump, big stride forward and fended towards the off side
full on middle and off, blocked off the front foot. Firmly tapped to mid on
good length on off stump, stands tall and fends towards the off side
short, slower ball on off stump. Roshen looked to pull but checks his shot towards the end. Turned towards the leg side
quick and full on middle stump, bunted down the ground past the non-striker, and there's no stopping that! Races away
good length on off stump, defended towards cover off the back foot
full on off stump, driven down the ground past mid on. Chase for the infielder, but he gets to the ball. There's his fifty - his fourth consecutive fifty-plus score
full on middle stump, straightens after pitching. Tapped back to Razzak
full on middle and leg, and stays very low! Takes his pads and dribbles away to short fine leg. Impact, however, was outside leg stump
full on off stump, tries to drive but the inside edge takes it towards midwicket instead
full on off stump, big stride forward and blocked
full just outside off, prods forward and blocks
full on off stump, defended to see the over out
full outside off, comes down the ground and gives it a wild slog. Takes a thick outside edge and goes over backward point. Falls safe, and runs away to the third-man boundary
good length on off stump, prods forward and defends
good length on middle stump, flicked off his hips towards the leg side
full just outside off, defended towards cover
full on middle stump, blocked
back of a length outside off, spins further away, cuts away from his body and beats backward point. No stopping that! Ends with a boundary
full on middle stump, defended off the front foot
full on off stump, driven back past Fizz but an excellent diving stop by mid off keeps it down to a dot
good length outside off, sticks his bat at it and taps it towards the off side
full on off stump, tries to drive toward the on side, but the leading edge takes it over mid off instead! They walk across for the single
good length on middle and off, defended off the back foot. The ball flies away towards the leg side
back of a length outside off, width offered but he misses the cut. Stayed low as the ball skidded through
good length outside off, backs away and punches to mid off
Roshen does well to get out of the way! Full on middle and leg, gets his front foot out of the way and smacks this past Roshen. Nifty work from the non-striker to get out of the ball's way
full on off stump, prods forward and defends
full on off stump, defended off the front foot. Two more deliveries for the second day
full outside off, another defense brought out by Lakmal
full on middle stump, and firmly defended off the front foot. The umpire knocks the bails off, and that's stumps
Nicely tossed up outside off, no turn for the first ball. Firmly defended off the front foot
back of a length outside off, turns into the right hander, low bounce. Left alone
back of a length outside off, lesser turn this time but coming into Roshen nonetheless. Hurries onto the back foot and defends
tossed up outside off, big stride forward and turned towards the leg side
pitched full outside off, Roshen gets his big stride forward and blocks
full ball to end the over, defended with soft hands towards the off side, and allows them to run across. Roshen keeps strike
full outside off, driven off the front foot with the open face, runs it down to deep backward point. Comes back on strike
back of a length on middle stump, angling across the right handed bat. Tries to poke at it but played with soft hands, thereby letting the thick outside edge fall short of first slip
fuller ball outside off, no footwork but attempts the drive anyway. Mistimed towards cover
full on off stump, gets onto the front foot, but mistimes that drive once more. Trickles down to cover
full on off stump, it's the offcutter this time. Holds up on the pitch, but the batsman is patient. Waits for it, before smothering it towards deep extra cover. Lakmal to face the last ball
it's a bluff.. full outside off, and bunted towards cover. Easily negated by Lakmal
full outside off, covers his off stump by shuffling across, and works it towards the leg side
full on off stump, onto the front foot, and blocked
tossed up wide outside off, tries to drive extravagantly, but mistimed back to the bowler
full on off stump, steps forward and turns it towards the leg side
good length wide outside off, no spin on this occasion and it's punished away towards the off side. Goes deep into the crease and carves past point. Races away to the backward point boundary
full outside off, charges down the ground and taps it back to Mehidy
back of a length outside off, angling into him forcing him to play at it. Defended off the back foot
back of a length outside off once again, flicked off his hips towards midwicket. Played in the air, but wide enough of forward short leg and short midwicket
back of a length outside off, jags away off the surface. Lets it go through
short outside off, but with not much bounce. Roshen keeps his bat down as the ball goes just over his shoulder
good length just outside off, stands tall and chops it down to third slip. Intentional
back of a length outside off, enough time for him to poke at it and run it down to deep cover. They walk across for the single, extending SL's lead to 322
good length outside off, big stride forward and fended
stays low! Full wide outside off, but grips off the rough and turns sharply in. Stays low as well, forcing Roshen to get his bat down real quick. Manages to tap it away
full outside off, spins inwards, tries to defend but hits his pads. Impact outside off as Mehidy appeals for the lbw
tossed up just outside off, shimmies down and nudges it to short midwicket
full on off stump, flicks it off his pads behind square on the leg side. Runs it down to the deep backward square
tossed up full and wide outside off, easily defended off the front foot towards the off side
back of a length outside off, gets onto the back foot and fends it towards the off side
short on off stump, but no real bounce once again. Comes to Roshen at hip high and it's comfortably flicked to deep backward square. Turns down the single
goes short outside off, extra bounce on this occasion! Sways out of the ball's line and lets it go
short once again, pitches outside off, and left alone once again. That's the warning for the second bouncer

short on middle and leg, and goes down the leg side as Roshen looks to get out of the ball's way. Excellent take by the keeper diving to his left. Every run important today, and the Bangladesh fielders are showing that
short on middle and leg, goes down the leg side again as Roshen looks to flick. Can't connect and Liton goes up for the caught behind! Nope, says the umpire
back of a length wide outside off, stands tall and works it towards deep midwicket with ease. That's a comfortable way to get off strike
full on off stump, driven down the ground to long on. Allows Lakmal to take strike once again
full on off stump, big stride forward and blocked
full outside off, once again defended off the front foot. Offers the bat's full face
full on off stump, shuffles across to the off side and defends. Comes off the bat's toe end as this one stays low
tossed up wide outside off, turns inwards but fended well by Lakmal
full on off stump from around the wicket, defended towards mid on
full on middle and leg and Roshen misses the flick towards the leg side. Raps him on thefront bad but impact was on leg stump. Would've gone down the leg side with his around-the-wicket angle
full and wide outside off, sticks his bat out and taps it to Mushfiqur in the deep behind point. Doesn't take the single
full and wide outside off, in the slot to be driven and he goes for it. It's a quicker ball and Silva's too slow to play at it. Flies past his bat's outside edge. That should keep the bowler excited
back of a length wide outside off, punched off the back foot to cover. They want the single, but the fielder is quick. Sends Lakmal scampering back
short outside off, angling in but tucks it to Razzak at deep backward square. Gets the single that he was looking for, and keeps strike
full outside off, muscled down the ground but Mehidy gets his body behind the line
full on off stump, turns it towards the leg side but falls just short of forward short leg. Definitely a chance but agonisinly close
full on middle stump and sharply turns down the leg side. Surprises the batsman
full on off stump, nudges it towards the leg side. Played off the front foot
back of a length outside off, turns inwards as Roshen backs away to carve towards point. Straight to the fielder
back of a length on middle stump, turns down the leg side as Roshen can't flick it away
full and wide outside off, tries to chase at it, but can't connect with the drive
good length wide outside off, tries poking at it but pulls his shot back. Zips past the outside edge
back of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot

flies through between first and second slip! Full and wide outside off, drives at it and takes a thick outside edge. Goes hard at that, thereby beating the slip fielder. Past the outstretched hands of Sabbir
back of a length on off stump, Lakmal hangs around on the back foot looking to defend but the ball goes straight through, instead of angling in. Goes past his outside edge
full on middle and leg, in the slot to be put away, and it's flicked nonchalantly towards the leg side. Enough power behind that shot, as it dribbles away to the deep midwicket boundary
full on off stump, turns into Roshen. Fended off the front foot
good length outside off, backs away and punches towards mid off
back of a length outside off, stays on the back foot and defends
full on off stump, Roshen charges down the wicket looking to flick towards the leg side but misses the timing. Inside edge onto his pads
full outside off, steps forward and blocks with the bat's full face
stays very low! Full outside off, and spinning sharply inwards. Has to skip onto the back foot, and does extremely well to get his bat down in time. Yikes
full on off stump, holds up off the surface. Gives it some air, and Lakmal defends slightly early. Pops up in the air as it goes past the umpire's right. Safe
tossed up outside off, and it's whacked over wide long on. On his pads and Lakmal gets his front foot out of the way and smacks it over the infield
full on off stump, big stride forward and defended
full on off stump, down on one knee, looking to slog sweep... but misses! Crashes into off stump and the captain shakes Taijul's hand. A useful knock comes to an end

that's two in two! Sri Lanka have no reviews. Pitched up full outside off, spins into Herath and he misses his defense. Hits him on the pad and the umpire's quick to raise his finger. Did that hit outside off? We'll never know. Silva remains not out as Sri Lanka are all out for 226.
back of a length on middle stump, flicked nicely past square leg. Chase for the infielder
back of a length on middle stump, zips past Tamim's shoulders as he lets it go. Quite close to him
full on off stump and angling wide across off, left alone by the batsman
good length on middle stump, beautiful delivery! Tamim's in two minds as he hangs back. Zips past his outside edge
full on off stump, big stride forward and defended
good length on middle and leg, glances it fine to short fine leg. No contact off the bat, comes off his hip instead

appeal for lbw, and given! Tamim reviews straightaway. Full outside off and turns into Tamim. He strides forward but the bat hits his boot and bounces away. The ball zips in and hits his front pad. No contact off the bat, and impact is umpire's call. Will go on to hit the stumps, so Tamim has to go! The impact was really close, but a little bit of the ball was in front of off stump. Big wicket for Sri Lanka!
full on off stump, flicked off his toes to deep midwicket
excellent ball! Good length just outside off, enticing the batsman to come forward. Zips across his bat's outside edge
short and wide outside off, tries to cut but stays low. Under edges it to the keeper's pads
full on middle stump, tries to defend but flies off the batsman's inside edge. Forward short leg was lurking by just far enough from him
full on middle stump, easily whipped off his toes towards the leg side
back of a length on off stump, stands tall and punches to short cover
short on middle stump, extra bounce and he rides it standing tall, sticks his bat out and the ball flies off his blade. Finds the gap between second and third slip. Close once again
back of a length on middle and off, shoulders his arms, allowing it to go through
overpitched outside off, covers his off-stump line and shoulders his arms once again
creamed! Back of a length outside off, cut off the back foot with some disdain! Runs away after beating the fielder at point
good length on off stump, angles across and left alone to see the over off. Nice carry through to Dickwella
full on off stump, defended off the front foot. The first delivery faced by Kayes
full once again on off, defended once more
full on middle and leg, gets down quick and fends
smacked! Full outside off, and he dances down the wicket! Lifted over cover and gets enough under that. No one in the deep as it takes a couple of bounces and into the ropes
full on off stump, angling into the batsman as he misses his defense. His his front pad but impact was on middle and leg. They appeal, but not given. Probably would've gone down the leg side
full on off stump, turns it towards the leg side on this occasion
good length on off stump, punched off the back foot to point
back of a length outside off, stands tall and punches off the back foot. Finds the gap on the off side
full on off stump, angling across Kayes as he's quick to shoulder his arms
good length on off stump, once again lets it go through after covering his off-stump line
full outside off, crunches this drive but straight to cover. Misses out
good length on middle stump, fended off the back foot to point
full on middle stump, big stride forward and defended. Played with soft hands
good length on middle stump, going down the leg side as he tries to flick this fine down the leg side. Can't connect
full outside off, grips and spins away from the left hander. Sharp take from Dickwella
full on off stump, big stride forward and fended back to Dilruwan
good length outside off, stays very low as the batsman taps it towards point. Early call for the single

dropped! Tough chance at first slip, but Karunaratne can't hold on. Full outside off, and he attempts the drive. Takes the outside edge and flies past the keeper's right to first slip. The dive to his right was good, but only finds the fielder's fingertips. Lucky
full on middle stump, no turn this time. Defended back to the bowler off the front foot
full on middle stump, turned off his toes to wide long on
full on off stump, fended off the front foot. Tapped back to the bowler

full on off stump, driven uppishly to mid off. Shouts of 'catch it' but drops short. They're going for the run, and the throw from the fielder is in quick, but misses the direct hit at the non-striker's end
good length on off stump, backs away and cuts in front of square. Beats point, who gives it a chase
full on leg stump, swept well to the man at backward square leg
good length on off stump, slashes hard at it and takes a thick outside edge. Flies over the keeper's right and through the slip cordon once again. Extra bounce forces the error
good length on middle stump, flicked towards the leg side
full on off stump, quick to step forward and defended
good length outside off, tapped towards point
full on middle and leg, worked off his toes in front of square on the leg side. Played softly enough to allow him to come back for the second
full on off stump, fended off the front foot. End of an eventful over
full on off stump, defended back
oh my! What's he up to? Full outside off, and Kayes gives it a charge. Tries to slog it towards the leg side. In the air, but falls short of the man at cow corner
full on middle and leg, defended towards the leg side
dropped once more! First slip once again. Terrific delivery, flighted outside off. Mominul tries to defend, but a sharp edge flies to first slip after deflecting off the keeper's pads. Toughie
reverse sweep! Full on leg stump, quick to get down on one knee and played towards the left-hander's off side. To deep point
full and wide outside off, tries to drive but the slash takes it down to deep backward square
back of a length on off stump, goes onto the back foot and works it towards the leg side
full on off stump, tries to defend but induces the inside edge. Crashes into his pads after that
full on leg stump, it's overpitched and swept well to deep backward square
back of a length outside off, enough width to comfortably cut. Goes to deep extra cover on this occasion
back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to cover
yorker on off stump. Kayes can't do anything except dig it back to the bowler
full on off stump, big stride forward and defended. Flies away towards the leg side
clears long off! Good length outside off, comes down the wicket and smacks it over the bowler's head. Forced to reach at it but enough contact from him. Soars over the boundary.
pays the price next ball! Full outside off, straighter one this time and his attempted defense takes the outside edge. Pushes hard at the ball, and the outside edge is easily pocketed by Dickwella
full on off stump, defended towards the leg side
full on off stump, played with the turn. Smothers the spin on this occasion
full on off stump, tapped back past the non-striker to mid on
full outside off, driven along the carpet to deep extra cover
back of a length outside off, tries to reverse sweep but can't connect with the ball staying low. Interesting shot option... has to be premeditated, one thinks
back of a length on off stump, turned off his hips towards the leg side
full outside off stump, gets to the pitch of the delivery and blocks
full on off stump, defended off the front foot towards the leg side

back of a length on off stump, spins sharply into the batsman as he tries another reverse sweep. Can't connect as the ball zips past the top of off stump. Dickwella can't hold on either as it races away
full on off stump, driven down the ground to long on
full on off stump, comes down the wicket and muscles it towards deep extra cover. Played along the ground
appeal for caught! But turned down. Full on off stump, spins into the batsman. Can't connect the defense, and the ball lobs up after hitting the pads. Taken by leg slip
full on off stump, defended off the front foot towards the leg side
full on off stump, overpitched delivery that's dug away well towards mid on
full and wide outside off, big stride forward... defended

taken one-handed by forward short leg! The umpire's not interested but Sri Lanka review. Good length ball outside off that takes extra bounce and spins into him, cramped for room as the ball takes his thigh guard. Pops up and Kusal Mendis dives forward to take a one-handed stunner. It's a stunner only if it comes off the bat, though, and replays show there's no contact with the bat. Terrific decision from the umpire in the first place.
back of a length outside off, opens the bat's face and runs it down to third man
full on leg stump, tapped back to Dilruwan
full on off stump, prods forward and defends with soft hands
back of a length on off stump, steps onto the back foot and punches towards cover point
back of a length outside leg stump, flicked off his pads towards the leg side. And with that, it's time for lunch.
full on off stump, defended off the front foot. Takes a bat-pad and towards the leg side
uses his feet to get to the pitch of this delivery. It's tossed up on off stump, and it's smacked over Herath's head. Off the middle of the bat
close! Full outside off, drifted in and goes through the gap between bat and pad. Takes an inside edge, then onto the pads as the ball trickles behind. Just past off stump.
full on off stump, another inside edge as the batsman tries to defend. Goes towards the leg side
full outside off stump, played with soft hands as the ball takes an outside edge this time. Chase for first slip
good length outside off, spins and bounces away from the right-handed bat. Tries to cut but can't connected. Deceived by that bounce
full on leg stump, tapped off the front foot to deep midwicket
full outside off, steps across to the off side and turns it towards short midwicket
good length outside off, goes straight through as he tries to cut. Misses that shot
full on middle stump, forces Mushfiq to step deep into his crease. Turned towards forward short leg
good length on middle stump, smothers the spin towards the leg side off the back foot. Leg slip and forward short leg look to chase behind it
pitched full on middle stump, worked off his toes to the leg side. Hits forward short leg's boot

given! Full outside off and Mominul plays for the turn. Goes straight through instead and takes a feather edge. Sharp take from Dickwella and it's the dangerous man who goes. Celebrations! Moves on to 413 wickets
full outside off, turns inwards, defended
full outside off, driven along the ground towards cover
full on middle and leg, dug away towards the leg side. Carefully played
full on off stump, once again tapped towards the leg side
good length on middle stump, goes onto the back foot and blocked
back of a length outside off, turns inwards. Stands tall and fends it away
full outside off, driven along the ground past cover. Chase for the fielder
full on off stump, defended towards the leg side. Firmly hit back
full on off stump, comes down the wicket and worked towards the leg side
full outside off, steps forward and bunts it down to long on for a walking single
full outside off, tries to play towards the leg side but closes the face of the bat too early. Takes a leading edge towards cover, but falls safe!
back of a length outside off, pokes at it and runs it down to point. Second slip races behind it
back of a length outside off, misses the shot. Defended
full on off stump, defended down the wicket back to Herath
full on leg stump, tapped towards the leg side. Runs it down to fine leg
full on off stump, shimmies down the wicket and uses his wrists to flick towards deep midwicket. Chase for wide mid on
full on middle and off, tapped down the ground past the non-striker to long off
full on leg stump, worked off his pads towards the leg side. Played with soft hands
gives it some air this time, pitches outside off and driven square off the front foot. Man in the deep
back of a length outside off, turns into the batsman, worked off the back foot to square leg
back of a length outside off, backs away and fends it
full outside off, lesser spin this time. The batsman was playing for the extra turn there. Hits the back foot, but impact was outside off. Saves him
back of a length on middle stump, turned off the back foot to forward short leg
full outside off, no spin first up. Flicked off the front foot to midwicket. They want the single, but sharp work from the fielder stops the single. Diving effort
full outside off once again, gives it some air as well. Driven on the up, and lobs up. But falls just short of cover
full outside off, defended off the front foot
appeal! But turned down! Good length outside off, comes down the wicket but can't turn it towards the leg side. Comes off his pads, and lobs into forward short leg's hand

quicker one, and straight into forward short leg's hands! Good length on off stump and takes some extra bounce on this occasion. Comes off his bat's handle and flies towards the infielder. Plucks it out of thin air!
tossed up wide outside off, spins sharply in. Misses the defense as it takes his pads. Appeal for lbw, but doesn't convince the umpire.
tossed up on off stump, to the pitch as he drives to long-off
length ball on off stump, defended on the front foot
beaten on the drive as he doesn't get to the pitch of this outside off. Keeps low and turns a long way, Dickwella can't gather either
good length on middle stump, defended on the front foot
sweetly hit. Good positive stride from Mushfiqur as he gets low, makes room, and sweeps with full control in front of deep square
good length on off stump, solidly defended on the front foot
back of a length and turning in sharply. Opens the face and chops to backward point
nicely done again. Plants the front leg forward and gets the reverse sweep away from the pitch of the ball. Finds deep backward point
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
back of a length outside off, backs away and nudges to deep backward point
tossed up outside off, flicked to long-on
steps out, converts it into a full toss and punches this through the open extra cover region
tossed up at off stump, pushed back to the bowler on the front foot
outside edge falls short of gully. Length and dipping on off stump. He pushes on the front foot with soft hands
arm ball, off stump. Defended off the inside half of the bat
lovely shot. Steps out and isn't quite to the pitch, but he's read the turn and has got close enough to hit through the line. Lifts it over extra cover
arm ball short of a length and in at off stump. Backs away and exposes the stumps before cutting this late to beat backward point

got him at slip! Mahmudullah's haphazard approach against spin gets him out for the second time in the Test. Premeditates and steps out early. Akila pushes it flat, gets it to dip just back of a length and has the Bangladesh captain scrambling to try and get behind the line with anything he can. But his front leg has to go too far across and the weight hasn't moved forward. Beaten in flight and stuck - you don't get away at this level. Can only manage to follow it with his hands and parry it to Karunaratne
tossed up outside off, sweeps along the floor to long leg

back of a length and slow at a middle stump line. Gets inside the  line, exposes the stumps and looks to ramp this. It hits the glove and falls into the pitch. Probably for his best. Slip and keeper at moved down leg and were waiting to pounce
tossed up on middle stump, can't beat short midwicket to his left with the flick
good length at off stump, defended on the front foot
back of a length outside off, backs away and guides it to deep backward point
full at off stump, defended back down the pitch
tossed up at middle stump, defended on the front foot
back of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
good length at middle stump, defended on the front foot
good length at off stump, defended on the back foot

superb from Herath. A ball worth of getting the wicket that equals Wasim Akram's wickets tally. Tossed up on off stump, drawing him in but beating him in dip. Then it spins past his outside edge and into the keeper's grasp. In the middle of all this, Mushfiqur has made the decision to go out very late and he misses. Stumped.

lobbed to short leg. Sabbir is dismissed by Dananjaya for the second time in five balls. A regulation length ball onmiddle stump. Half a stride from the batsman as he stabs at this. Inside edge Glove onto front pad and a simple take for the fielder
looks to slog this but gets an inside edge through short fine. Tossed up on middle stump and he gets the front leg out of the way to hoick at this
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot

looks to slog, and he's beaten. His trailing leg looks antsy as Dickwella takes the bails off. They've sent it upstairs....and he'll be out. The back leg is outside the crease as the keeper gathers this outside off and stumps him
good length, on off stump. Plays for the turn. Gets it off the inside half on the front foot
tossed up on middle stump, defended on the front foot
inside edge as he pushes on the front foot. Length ball doesn't turn away and this slips through from between his legs
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
tossed up on off stump, defended off the inside half of the bat
good length outside off, reaches out and pushes this through point
length ball comes in with the arm and catches him on the front foot, but it was sliding down leg
length ball on off stump, gets down to try and paddle this. Deflects to gully off the pad
tossed up on middle stump, lunges forward and pushes this past the non-striker to get a single at mid-on

just clears deep square leg. Beaten in flight after stepping out but he goes through with the shot. A slog with the turn, and the fielder would have had it if he was back on the fence. He's running backwards and it just clears the boundary
dropped at short leg and it was a difficult chance. Spits up on him as he defends on the front foot and the inside edge goes into the floor

five for Akila! Floats it outside off, draws him forward and gets him to stab at it with hard hands. He's playing against the turn, away from the body and he's got a thin edge. It's another sharp catch from Dickwella, this was rising sharply
slogged away. Tossed up on a leg stump line, gets to the pitch of this and sends it into the wide long-on boundary on the bounce
inside edge as he looks to slog another one against the turn. This rolls out to deep midwicket
tossed up outside off, swipes across the line and is beaten. Keeper fumbles
good length at off stump, gets under this with the reverse sweep and slices it to the third man boundary

taken at deep midwicket! Rangana Herath's 415 Test wickets are the most by a left-arm bowler in Tests. Feeds him on the slog sweep, tossing this outside off. He takes the bait, and hits it quite well, but he can't clear the fielder on the boundary
